org.timepedia.chronoscope.client
Class HistoryManager

java.lang.Object
  org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.HistoryManager

public class HistoryManager
extends java.lang.Object

Manages list of instantiated charts, can return serialized state of a chart, and maintain a stack of states for undo/redo capability. Wen a previous history state is restored, the HistoryManager deserializes state to all registered charts.
